appendix.title: Merchant Category Codes
appendix.para: The following table lists merchant category code values DE 026 (see ).

row.entry: Masonry, stonework, tile setting, platering and insulation contractors
Roofing, siding and sheet metal work contractors
Special trade contractors - not elsewhere classified
Speciality cleaning, polishing and sanitation preparations
Local and suburban commuter passenger transportation, including ferries
Motor freight carriers and trucking - local and long distance, moving and storage companies and local delivery
Courier services - air, ground and freight forwarders
Public warehousing and storage - farm products, refrigerated goods and household goods
Airports, flying fields and airport terminals
Telecommunication services, including local and long distance calls, credit card calls, call through use of magnetic stripe reading telephones and faxes
Cable and other pay television services
Utilities - electric, gas, water and sanitary
Motor vehicle supplies and new parts
Office, photographic, photocopy and microfilm equipment
Computers, computer peripheral equipment — not elsewhere classified
Plumbing and heating equipment and supplies
Precious stones and metals, watches and jewellery
Stationery, office supplies and printing and writing paper
Piece goods, notions and other dry goods
Men’s, women’s and children’s uniforms and commercial clothing
Chemicals and allied products — not elsewhere classified
Florists’ supplies, nursery stock and flowers
Lawn and garden supplies outlets, including nurseries
Miscellaneous food shops - convenience and speciality retail outlets
Car and truck dealers (new and used) sales, services, repairs, parts and leasing
Car and truck dealers (used only) sales, service, repairs, parts and leasing
Service stations (with or without ancillary services)
Camper, recreational and utility trailer dealers
Miscellaneous automotive, aircraft and farm equipment dealers — not elsewhere classified
Package shops — beer, wine and liquor
Antique shops — sales, repairs and restoration services
Stationery, office and school supply shops
Jewellery, watch, clock and silverware shops
Gift, card, novelty and souvenir shops
Sewing, needlework, fabric and piece goods shops
Direct marketing — combination catalogue and retail merchants
Direct marketing/direct marketers — not elsewhere classified
Hearing aids — sales, service and supplies
Typewriter outlets — sales, service and rentals
Fuel dealers — fuel oil, wood, coal and liquefied petroleum
Pet shops, pet food and supplies
Swimming pools — sales, supplies and services
Electric razor shops — sales and service
Miscellaneous apparel and speciality retail outlets
Non-financial institutions — foreign currency, money orders (not wire transfer), scrip and travellers’ checks
Shoe repair shops, shoe shine parlours and hat cleaning shops
Counselling services — debt, marriage and personal
Buying and shopping services and clubs
Clothing rentals — costumes, uniforms and formal wear
Miscellaneous personal services — not elsewhere classified
Quick copy, reproduction and blueprinting services
Employment agencies and temporary help services
Computer programming, data processing and integrated systems design services
Computer maintenance and repair services — not elsewhere classified
Management, consulting and public relations services
Detective agencies, protective agencies and security services, including armoured cars and guard dogs
Equipment, tool, furniture and appliance rentals and leasing
Motor home and recreational vehicle rentals
Air conditioning and refrigeration repair shops
Electrical and small appliance repair shops
Watch, clock and jewellery repair shops
Miscellaneous repair shops and related services
Motion picture and video tape production and distribution
Theatrical producers (except motion pictures) and ticket agencies
Bands, orchestras and miscellaneous entertainers — not elsewhere classified
Commercial sports, professional sports clubs, athletic fields and sports promoters
Betting, including lottery tickets, casino gaming chips, off-track betting and wagers at race tracks
Amusement parks, circuses, carnivals and fortune tellers
Membership clubs (sports, recreation, athletic), country clubs and private golf courses
Doctors and physicians — not elsewhere classified
Medical services and health practitioners — not elsewhere classified
Colleges, universities, professional schools and junior colleges
Schools and educational services — not elsewhere classified
Court costs, including alimony and child support
